author: Cat Clifford
title: Bill Gates: If I were president, this is what I would do now to fight coronavirus - CNBC
description: Bill Gates: If I were president, this is what I would do now to fight coronavirus CNBC Bill Gates wants businesses to stay closed in coronavirus pandemic Vox.com Bill Gates uses coronavirus outbreak to blast President Donald Trump on 'pile of bodies' Washingt…
content:
If Bill Gates were President of the United States right now, he would prioritize keeping people across America in isolation to "flatten the curve" of the COVID-19 pandemic.
"The clear message [would be] that we have no choice to maintain this isolation and t… [+2988 chars]
